message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $18000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $16500, but I have to say, I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I can do $16000, but I'm not going any lower than that. I've already given you a pretty good deal, considering the product is worth $15000 to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking $14000 is a fair price for the product.
I've already given you a significant discount, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $15500. I think that's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still thinking $14500 is a fair price for the product.

I've been patient, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $15000 and $14500, so I'm going to offer it to you for $14750. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking $14500 is the best price for the product.
